title: Stormy Daniels
summary: Stephanie Gregory Clifford (born March 17, 1979),[1][5][6] known professionally as Stormy Daniels, is an American pornographic actress, film director,[7][8] and former stripper. She has won numerous industry awards, and is a member of the NightMoves, AVN and XRCO Halls of Fame.[9][10][11] In 2009, a recruitment effort led her to consider challenging incumbent David Vitter for the 2010 Senate election in her native Louisiana.[12]
